::Firearm/Prowl::

Firearm looks at the other bots, opening his mouth to reply when he heard 
Iron Raptor. He looks at her, as she runs up to him.

"Prowl here tried to help me take on Oblitertron," he says sadly, holding out 
Prowl's smashed and battered body for Iron Raptor to take. Prowl was in 
terrible shape. His chest plate was smashed in, one of his arms almost 
severed, and both wings broken. His mech fluid covered both him and Firearm, 
and was now making a puddle on the floor. Circuits were jammed and sticking 
out around his torso. Prowl had stopped breathing by now, and was hardly 
alive.

"I think he's too far gone for a CR," Firearm says sadly, handing Prowl to 
Iron Raptor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
(Sorry if this is inacurate, but its been a long time since I've seen TF: The 
Movie, and my VCR is busted, so I can't watch it.)

Inside Prowl's mind, a scene was taking place. A scene from his previous 
death. He was sitting in an Autobot shuttle, monitoring a screen. They were 
headed to earth, to Autobot City. Deep in thought, Prowl watches the screen, 
glancing at the Autobots around him.

An explosion behind shakes him out of his thoughts, followed by a yell. 
"Decepticons!"

Prowl gets out of his chair, spinning around and firing a shot at the group 
of Decepticons in the shuttle. His shot misses, blowing up a piece of 
equipment in the back of the shuttle. A yellow bot, one of the 
Constructocons, fires a shot at Prowl, hitting the Autobot in the chest.

Prowl's systems yell at him in pain as Scavenger's shot hits, overheating 
most of his circuits. His optic sensors start smoking as Prowl falls to his 
knees, the rest of his body overbalancing and falling as well. Prowl's optics 
deactivate, the Autobot dead in a few seconds.
